text: PGU Tiraspol, also known as PGU-Kartina TV Tiraspol due to sponsorship reasons, is a Moldovan handball team located in Tiraspol. They compete in the National Super League of Moldova. They won their last championship in 2015. == Titles http://bundesligainfo.de/Saison/Ausland/Meister/== * National Super League ** Winners (14): 1999, 2000, 2001, 2002, 2003, 2004, 2005, 2006, 2007, 2008, 2010, 2012, 2013, 2015 ==European record == {| class="wikitable" !
